meanings.sent1: The grandiflora bouquet brightened up the room.
meanings.sent2: The garden was filled with grandiflora roses.
meanings.sent3: The grandiflora daisies danced in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her smile bloomed grandiflora, lighting up her face.
meanings.sent5: The grandiflora peonies stood out among the other flowers.

meanings.definition: A plant or flower with large or showy blooms.
meanings.sent1: She admired the grandiflora in the botanical garden.
meanings.sent2: The grandiflora in the park attracted many visitors.
meanings.sent3: The grandiflora in the vase seemed to wink at her.
meanings.sent4: His garden was a grandiflora paradise.
meanings.sent5: The grandiflora in her yard was the envy of the neighborhood.
